name: EvalHum Initiative
goal:
This association aims to encourage, promote and coordinate all studies and research into the evaluation of research in the Social Sciences and Humanities in all its aspects: representations of quality, bibliometric studies, qualitative analyses, intra- and extra-academic impact, societal impact, effects et uses of evaluations, etc. It particularly takes as its mission to serve, at an international level as a means of information and networking between researchers as well as centres and institutions for research evaluation with a particular emphasis on the SSH.

Its aim is to contribute to a better understanding and recognition of the value of Social Sciences and Humanities research, by researchers in other fields of science, by its stakeholders and by society as a whole.
interests: Culture, Education, Environment, Information Society, Research and Technology, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives: Resaerch evaluation policy. Funding streams that involved the Social sciences and humanities
